CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Sunrise New Energy Co Ltd is engaged in the manufacturing and sale of graphite anode material for EVs and other lithium-ion batteries. The Company's joint venture is into the construction of a manufacturing plant in Guizhou Province. The plant runs on inexpensive electricity from renewable sources that enables the group to be a low-cost and low environmental impact producer of graphite anode material, Its products includeÃ,Â GS-1,Ã,Â GS-2,Ã,Â GS-3,Ã,Â GZD-1,Ã,Â GLD-1, andÃ,Â GZ-1.
